hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sa`d:Once the people of Quba fought with each other till they threw stones on each other. When Allah's Apostle was informed about it, he said, "Let us go to bring about a reconciliation between them

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ الإِمَامِ لأَصْحَابِهِ اذْهَبُوا بِنَا نُصْلِحُ
chapter.eng-name: "Let us go to bring about a (re)conciliation."
